data.text: @chrisvanderveen I’m thinking you deserve a nice north face jacket!
@Demchak8 @chrisvanderveen @GovofCO And join the majority of Colorodans who have been there for months? Remember wash your hands, stay home if you are sick and wear a mask is you want to.

@Demchak8 @chrisvanderveen @GovofCO I just teared up reading your comment! We went to our daughter’s choir performance in a coffee shop tonight and I was so happy for the small biz owners who had a big crowd of business!
@chrisvanderveen I won’t get you all tshirts, but if you send me your Venmo I’ll buy you a beer. 😂
@chrisvanderveen @GovofCO CDC has acknowledged natural immunity! There is no need for Polis to outwardly create division amongst those who are vax and those not. https://t.co/fo4n01jpwY

@chrisvanderveen I finally erased my flow chart for COVID response in my office at school the other day. Had to take a picture and hang it up next to it. Hopefully as a conversation piece and not so I can recreate it again. https://t.co/DsqRjXjL6u
@chrisvanderveen @GovofCO Thank you Chris for reporting clear info that I could understand. I relied on your updates. I’m grateful to you and all local journalists. 🙏
